Tamil Nadu's Principal Secretary for Industries, N Muruganandam spoke on the challenges and emerging opportunities in Electronic Sector with the potential investors from Japan in a webinar organised by Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology and Indian Embassy. Several participants from companies such as Panasonic, Daikin, TDK Corporation etc have attended the webinar. Tamil Nadu is the second largest economic powerhouse in India and is the most sought-after investment destinations due to its strategic location, conducive business environment, state-of-the-art infrastructure, proactive governance and favourable ecosystem, said Muruganandam. COVID-19 HDD Industry Impact ...  production in CQ1 2020, particularly in China as well as in Southeast Asian HDD and HDD component production sites in countries such as Malaysia and Thailand. Note that Seagate and WDC have head wafer plants in the US. Seagate has some head processing in Northern Ireland as well. Toshiba does much of its HDD manufacturing in the Philippines, while its heads and media come from TDK and Showa Denko (Japanese companies with manufacturing plants in Japan and Southeast Asia). Nidec, makes most of the spindle motors for the HDD industry in Japan as well as Southeast Asia.
